title: HCLTech extends 15-year-old partnership with Xerox
description: HCLTech said in a filing with BSE that it will leverage automation, product and sustenance engineering and process operations services, along with its advanced full-stack GenAI platform, HCLTech AI Force.
content: HCLTech extended its 15-year-old partnership with digital printing company Xerox for an undisclosed amount on Monday. The extended relation focuses on strategic AI-driven engineering services and digital process operations (DPO) partnership with Xerox. The Indian IT services major will assist Xerox in its reinvention and help it for long-term profitable and sustainable growth.
